title: Share of adults who are obese vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Obesity is defined as having a body-mass index (BMI) â‰¥ 30. BMI is a person's weight (in kilograms) divided by their height (in meters) squared. GDP per capita measured in constant international-$ means it is adjusted for price differences between countries and adjusted for inflation to allow comparisons between countries and over time.
sourceDesc: WHO, Global Health Observatory; World Bank
